title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; installable via PyPI.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: First-class LangChain LLM and chat interface backed by Ollama, allowing local models in chains, agents and RAG.

title: jmorganca/ollama-inspector
summary: Simple TUI (Text UI) that browses and inspects model layers, tensors and configs served by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (ChatGPT-style) for Ollama—chat history, multi-model, file uploads, dark mode.

title: npm: ollama
summary: Official npm package providing the JS client for Ollama; 20 kB, ESM & CommonJS.

title: PyPI: ollama
summary: Official Python client published by Ollama, supports 3.8+ and asyncio.

title: ollama/ollama-main
summary: Curated examples: LangChain, LlamaIndex, Ray Serve, Docker Compose, GPU/CPU Dockerfiles.

title: ollama/ollama-accelerator
summary: Experimental plugins for Metal, ROCm and CUDA acceleration beyond default llama.cpp.

title: ollama/ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-rust/ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama REST API; tokio-based with Serde models.

title: ollama/ollama-distro
summary: Build scripts producing signed .deb, .rpm, Homebrew and Chocolatey packages for every release.

title: ollama/ollama-hub
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfiles, LoRA adapters and quantized variants.

title: ollama/ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama models to IDEs (VS Code, Cursor) for inline completion.

title: ollama/ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 or GCP instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama/ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for Ollama, optimized for macOS/iOS apps using native URLSession.

title: ollama/ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI copilot sidebar powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama/ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment config to scale Ollama replicas across a Ray cluster with autoscaling.

title: r/ollama - Local LLM ecosystem discussion
summary: Active subreddit for sharing Modelfiles, benchmarks, integrations and troubleshooting Ollama.
